name: Gummy Blast - Match 3 Puzzle Game Adventure
name_original: Gummy Blast - Match 3 Puzzle Game Adventure
description:
Gummy Blast your way to hours of fun-filled gaming in this delightful new Match 3 puzzle game. So cute and funny you will love the easy to use gameplay, gorgeous visuals and exciting power ups. Can you beat the levels to be a Gummy Pro?

Testimonial Reviews
- "Best game I have played in a while"
- "Absolutely in love with this game"
- "Heaps more fun and challenging than other puzzle games I've played"

Gummy Blast features:

•Unlike other puzzle games, you can slide whole rows and columns to easily make matches.

•Make unique power up bombs to help you along the way when matching more than 4 gummies. Discover all bombs including the rare Unicorn and Dragon bombs.

•Blastastic combos that will give you an edge to finish difficult levels.

•Easy to play yet challenging and extremely fun.

•Leaderboards to compete with your friends.

•Send and receive lives between you and your friends.
